text: Yeh kabhi ikatthey hokar ( khule maidan mein ) tumhara muqabla na karenge, ladenge bhi to qila-band bastiyon ( fortified townships) mein baith kar ya deewaron ke peechay chup kar. Yeh aapas ki mukhalifat mein baday sakht hain. Tum unhein ikhatta samajte ho magar inke dil ek dusre se phatey huey hain. Inka yeh haal isliye hai ke yeh be aqal log hain
